name: Cube Rush (R-Game12)
description:
For all gamers fun of challenges , try to beat the three levels featured in this game with each level completely different from the other .From running away from the void to rushing to the end to the level trying not to dissapear and defeating the big boss.

The player and enemies have simple geometric shapes but are bright and colorful to make the game more interesting to play.

 So yeah have Fun!

Programming by : Gnowa Rickneil.

GFx by : Gnowa Bryan.

This game features musics created using

Groovepad. 

Available on the App Store, https://apps.apple.com/app/id1454398991

Note:

-Game Resolution is  Fullscreen window.
